page.title: 06Nightlife.
page.content: Mexborough, Swinton, Wath and Denaby offer a wide range of facilities for an evenings entertainment locally. There are several public houses especially geared towards the younger generation and its needs including discos and modern music. An excellent example of this is the Towpath at Swinton. Many of the public houses though are engineered to please the older generation wishing for an evenings entertainment in more pleasant and peaceful surroundings. An example of this is the Dog Daisy in Mexborough which is a modern building but a place that keeps up all traditions of old. The Empress at Mexborough is an excellent place to go for the occaissional night out. It is a ballroom but also has facilities for discos pool, snooker and private
